wikipedia_page.main: Natasha Perdue (born 27 July 1975) is a British weightlifter who competed for Great Britain at the 2012 Olympic Games in London.  Perdue's father Terry Perdue was also a weightlifter and competed at the 1968 and 1972 Olympics.
